product_name: Nite Ize Helmet Marker Plus Rear Bike Light
long_description: The Nite Ize Helmet Marker Plus rear bike light attaches to the back of your helmet to increase rear visibility with its bright LED light. Light attaches securely to your helmet via rip-and-stick fasteners. Light is reflective, even when the LED is not illuminated, to enhance visibility. The Nite Ize Helmet Marker Plus rear bike light includes a reuseable rubber twist tie to attach the light to your seat post, backpack, handlebars, basket or rack. Operates in flash or glow modes with the simple push of a button. Includes a replacable 2032 3V lithium battery; 75 hr. battery life on steady glow.
